DependenciesÔÉÅ

Here are the modules Krajjat uses to run properly:

  • SciPy for handling .wav files and getting the audio envelope, and for saving files in .mat format (Matlab)

  • NumPy for saving .wav files, and handling arrays for other dependencies.

  • Matplotlib

  • openpyxl for opening and saving files in .xlsx (Excel format)

  • Parselmouth

  • Pygame

  • cv2

Moreover, it is necessary to have FFmpeg installed on your computer in order to generate videos with display_functions.create_sequence_video().
